name: domain-safety-monitor
description: Monitor domains using Google Safe Browsing API

scripts.test-connection: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); console.log('Testing DB connection...'); require('./db').execute('SELECT 1').then(() => console.log('✅ Database connection successful!')).catch(e => console.error('❌ Connection failed:', e.message))"
scripts.scan: node -e "require('./monitor').scanDomains().then(r => console.log('Scan complete:', r)).catch(e => console.error('Scan failed:', e))"
